Articles.Content:
Well, I need to do a movie for a school project/youtube, so I decided to do a modded version of the Apollo 11 mission in KSP style. I downloaded a few mods:
 

Spoiler

Ven's stock Revamp, 

EVE,

Planet Shine, 

Distant object enhancements,

RPM, 

ASET props

Mk1-2 IVA by ASET,

and Sunflares.

And decided to start the game up and begin recording. 

Loading screen was fine, and it showed all the clouds and whatnot. 

Started a new game and labeled it.

On entrance to the game, I clicked on the launchpad to launch the KerbalX. 

All craft showed up as locked, even though this is a sandbox game. 

 

Huh? I went to the VAB to check the available parts. Only the MK3 pod and both mk1 plane pods were unlocked. Very strange. 

I restarted the game, and even deleted my old saves from before, (I moved them to a labeled folder on my desktop) but it didn't do anything. 

 

O_o Need some advice here. 

 

 

 

EDIT: Never mind guys! I figured out that I installed a mod wrong.

Edited July 19, 2017 by Lo Var Lachland
